alert.note: Alert for Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 08 at 12:39PM PST until December 09 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 3 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Ventura County Beaches and Ventura County Inland Coast. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 3 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are likely. Travel will be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around large trees. If possible, remain indoors and avoid windows. Use extra caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast
